messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/5040042/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html
File doc/devel/weekly.html (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5040042/diff/1/doc/devel/weekly.html#newcode62
doc/devel/weekly.html:62: * json: if a field's tag is "-", never encode it.
The CL description wasn't updated. This should be something like this:

  json: if a field's tag is "-", ignore the field for encoding and decoding.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

There's no gofix for either API change but instances of the old API
will be caught by the compiler. The Weekday one is easy to update by
hand. The Walk one may take more consideration, but will have fewer
instances to fix.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, dsymonds@golang.org, r@google.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=8a09ce0cefc6 ***

weekly.2011-09-16

R=golang-dev, dsymonds, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5040042
